solution.text:
\( (-\frac {_{j}_}{_{k}_} \times \frac {_{k}_}{_{l}_}) + \frac {_{{l+1}}_}{_{j}_} -( \frac {_{k}_}{_{l}_} \times \frac {_{l}_}{_{{2*j}}_}) \)
\( \Rightarrow -\frac{_{j}_}{_{l}_} + \frac{_{{l+1}}_}{_{j}_} - \frac{_{k}_}{_{{2*j}}_} \)
Taking common denominator for all fractions,
\( \Rightarrow -\frac{_{{2*j*j}}_}{_{{2*j*l}}_} + \frac{_{{(l+1)*l*2}}_}{_{{2*j*l}}_} - \frac{_{{k*l}}_}{_{{2*j*l}}_} \)
\( \Rightarrow _{{Fraction((-2*j*j)+((l+1)*l*2)-(k*l),2*j*l)}}_ \) = _{{trunc(((-2*Decimal(j)*j)+((l+1)*l*2)-(k*l))/(2*j*l),2)}}_
